document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2018-07
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE TO INCREASE THE ALLOWABLE BUILDING HEIGHT OF OVERNIGHT ACCOMMODATIONS, LODGING SERVICES IN THE COMMUNITY COMMERCIAL ZONING DISTRICT TO 54 FEET AND 4 STORIES ON THE EAST SIDE OF BROADWAY
